From: Shubham Mishra, ValiantIQ Inc smishra@valiantiq.com Reply to: smishra@valiantiq.com Client: OPWDD-NY
Title: Software Developer
Location: Schenectady, NY (Hybrid)
Duration: 12+ Months
Required Documentation:
• Résumé
• Copy of Candidate Identification (i.e., Driver’s License/Green Card/Visa and Passport if applicable)
• Any documents referenced in the above Requested Qualifications (i.e., professional certifications, degrees, etc.)
Position MANDATORY Qualification:
Position Job Title Description: Is involved with all facets of the software development process, including the research, design, programming, testing and implementation of computer software.
Position Skill Level Description: 84+ months: Candidate is able to provide guidance to large teams and/or has extensive industry experience and is considered at the top of his/her field.
List all the Position REQUESTED Qualifications:
84 months experience programming server-side Java web applications in a multi-tier environment using JDK 1.5 or higher.
60 months experience writing queries, stored procedures, functions, packages, and triggers in Oracle 10g or higher.
48 months development experience in database design and object creation/modification of databases consisting of 20 or more tables in Oracle 10g or higher.
48 months programming experience with Java Server Faces.
36 months programming experience with Java Persistence API.
36 months experience with JavaScript/JQuery.
